hint: Apply safe, selective filters early in the query plan by converting implicit joins to explicit syntax and pushing date/dimension constraints down before the main aggregation.
Isolate selective date_range and dimension filters into CTEs, then join with the fact table using explicit JOIN syntax to reduce intermediate result sizes.
Materialize all pre-filtered dimension and fact tables in separate CTEs, then perform a single join pass with the aggregated results to minimize repeated scans.
Restructure the conditional aggregation using a decomposed approach—potentially splitting the fact table scan by date ranges or using UNION techniques to optimize the CASE evaluations.
